tool_description:
Api of leboncoin
if you need this api contact me on private XD
title: LBC Shark

api_list.name: SingleOffer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lbc-shark.p.rapidapi.com/api/parrot/v1/classified/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lbc-shark.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: PhoneNumber
api_list.description: you can get the PhoneNumber of any Listing on LBC

required_parameters.name: list_id
required_parameters.description:
listing ID 

for example this is your URL : www.leboncoin.fr/voitures/2019289966.htm

ID is : 2019289966

api_list.name: Offers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lbc-shark.p.rapidapi.com/finder/search"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lbc-shark.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
